original_text: So Saul became even more afraid of David. Saul was David's enemy for the rest of his life.
korean_text: 사울이 다윗을 더욱더욱 두려워하여 평생에 다윗의 대적이 되니라

sentences.original_text: So Saul became even more afraid of David
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사울은 다윗을 더욱 두려워하게 되었다

sentences.original_text: for the rest of his life
